Name: Gargoyle Tail Axe
Description: Sliced tail of the gargoyle guarding the Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church. Can be used as a bronze battle axe. Bends dramatically during large attacks, owing to its nature as a tail. Sliced tail of the gargoyle guarding the Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church or patrolling in Anor Londo. Can be used as a bronze battle axe. Bends dramatically during large attacks, owing to its nature as a tail.
